content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5), boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and offshore pump (not placed due to inventory issue).

### Copper plate mine at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) and a furnace at position(-5.0, -65.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) and a furnace at position(-5.0, -65.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine (not detailed in logs)
- Beltgroup (position not detailed) that connects the furnace at position -5.0, -65.0 to assembling machine (not detailed in logs)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to lack of pipes in inventory
- Ensure to collect enough pipes before attempting to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure the Offshore Pump is in inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
